bibl.title: Complaint to the Epistrategus Vedius Faustus.
bibl.note: The lower part of the papyrus (lines 18 through 37) = P. Mich. Inv. 3000 has been published by E.M. MICHAEL as No. 12 of his Ph.D. (Ann Arbor, 1966) = S.B. XII, 11114. Complaint by the well known veteran Gaius Julius Niger against a certain Isidorus, son of Achillas, scribe of the superintendants of sequestered property and - as Niger stresses - an Egyptian. Karanis, February 15, A.D. 163.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Mich. Inv. 2848 + 3000 145.4 P. Mich. Michael 12
SIJPESTEIJN P.J., Complaint to the Epistrategus Vedius Faustus.

The lower part of the papyrus (lines 18 through 37) = P. Mich. Inv. 3000 has been published by E.M. MICHAEL as No. 12 of his Ph.D. (Ann Arbor, 1966) = S.B. XII, 11114. Complaint by the well known veteran Gaius Julius Niger against a certain Isidorus, son of Achillas, scribe of the superintendants of sequestered property and - as Niger stresses - an Egyptian. Karanis, February 15, A.D. 163.
